metadata.title: President lauds security forces for eliminating terrorists in Tirah

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 17 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari Friday lauded the security forces for eliminating five terrorists during operation in Tirah , district Khyber. He appreciated the bravery of security forces for killing five Khawarij including Khawariji ringleader Obaidullah during an intelligence based operation. He expressed determination to completely eradicate Fitna Al-Khawarij from the country. The President said security forces were carrying out operations to eliminate the menace of terrorism. The whole nation was united against terrorism, adding operation would continue against Fitna al-Khawarij till its complete eradication.
